roleset.name: make composition that of rubber
roleset.note: RUBBERIZE-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from rubberize.01-v)

example.name: rubberize-v: past participle, arg1 only
example.text: It gave the rubberized fabric a dull gleam , like metal .
